comments:
When starting a Muse client-proxy application I frequently get the below exception and apparently this also is the reason why the app-startup then hangs (falsely reporting that it is waiting for the server to start up, while the "Servers" view already reports the server (Tomcat 5.5) as "Started").

This is on Eclipse 3.3M4 with btm.wsdm-TPTP-4.4.0 extensions & muse 2.1.0.

...

!MESSAGE Internal Error
